thread.title: Travel Agents Association of India signs MOU with college tourism department
thread.title_full: Travel Agents Association of India signs MOU with college tourism department

author: eTN Editor
title: Travel Agents Association of India signs MOU with college tourism department
text:
Click here for information and nomination Travel Agents Association of India signs MOU with college tourism department 
The Travel Agents Association of India’s (TAAI’s) endeavor to promote tourism and encourage youth to enhance their skills from the grassroots level has seen a change after TAAI Tourism Council Chairman Jay Bhatia initiated and signed an MOU with HR College in Mumbai last year. 
Working its way forward, TAAI’s Karnataka Chapter has signed an MOU with Garden City College (GCC) of Management in Bangalore. The Chairman of the TAAI Karnataka Chapter, Mr. M.S. Raghavan, signed the MOU on behalf of TAAI on October 20, 2015 for a period of 3 years. 
TAAI will enhance and cultivate on-the-job value to the students and create an industry and academia platform for nurturing new talent. Oct 24, 2015
